contexts.title: Project Overview
contexts.content: The Agentic AI project aims to develop an intelligent presentation creation system that can autonomously generate content based on user requirements.

contexts.title: AI Definition
contexts.content: Artificial Intelligence refers to systems that can perform tasks requiring human intelligence, such as visual perception, speech recognition, and decision-making.

contexts.title: Company Mission
contexts.content: Our mission is to democratize access to high-quality presentations through AI-powered tools that make professional content creation available to everyone.

contexts.title: Market Trend
contexts.content: The global AI market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 37.3% from 2023 to 2030, reaching $1.8 trillion by the end of the forecast period.

contexts.title: Customer Pain Point
contexts.content: Many professionals spend 5-10 hours per week creating presentations, with 68% reporting that they feel their time could be better spent on more strategic tasks.
